title: GxSTxV
author: GxSTxV
content: Well this is the first time that happened to me while i was navigating in BTT earlier i got surprised by this error message from cloudflare and thought it's wouldn't open again. I don't know if I'm the only one who got it since nobody is talking about itWhat makes it awkward is the error from host not anything else

comments.author: hosemary
comments.body: Quote from: GxSTxV on December 05, 2022, 08:32:38 PMI don't know if I'm the only one who got it since nobody is talking about itNo. You are not the only one who have got this error from cloudflare. Visit the topic created by JollyGood.Cloudflare error 524 Problems (now locked)

comments.author: GxSTxV
comments.body: Quote from: hosseinimr93 on December 05, 2022, 08:43:33 PMQuote from: GxSTxV on December 05, 2022, 08:32:38 PMI don't know if I'm the only one who got it since nobody is talking about itNo. You are not the only one who have got this error from cloudflare. Visit the topic created by JollyGood. Cloudflare error 524 Problems (now locked)Yes thank you i just saw it, JollyGood is getting this error on two pages when he tries to edit some settings in his profile. It's the same error message but for me i got it while i was navigating the forum exactly when i tried to post a reply

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: GxSTxV on December 05, 2022, 08:51:50 PMYes thank you i just saw it, JollyGood is getting this error on two pages when he tries to edit some settings in his profile. It's the same error message but for me i got it while i was navigating the forum exactly when i tried to post a reply It happens usually but not that severe as it will be okay after a refresh or two. This also happens when you click the "all" to show all replies on a thread, making a search, or just browsing. Or doing anything that loads huge data from the server or the server having heavy traffic on that specific moment.
